name: Ludum Dare 44: Live2Dig
description:
My first ever Ludum Dare entry. Conserve your life as you progress past obstacles! Use it to purchase better tools between levels! Live to Dig!

Control the robot with WASD, shoot out destructible terrain with the Space Bar, and press ESC at any time to exit the game.

As will be immediately evident by anyone who downloads, I was unable to complete Live to Dig during the provided weekend. As it was my first Jam I definitely learned a lot but bit off a bit more than I could chew, and had life interfere with the scheduled development time. I would love to return to this concept and finish my initial idea, and if I find the time I will document that progress here.

** DEVELOPMENT BREAKDOWN TO COME **
